experiences.title: Station Manager - Flying V (Balete Branch)
experiences.description: I managed daily, weekly, and monthly reports with Excel, scheduled staff efficiently, handled sales transactions and bank deposits, maintained inventory and quality control, oversaw cleanliness, managed procurement, ensured compliance with regulations, and tracked station expenses.

experiences.title: Part Time Front-End Developer Virtual Assistant - TEASEMEHAIR
experiences.description: I managed a Squarespace website by enhancing the layout for a better user experience, regularly updating product listings, and ensuring responsive design across all devices.

experiences.title: Junior Web Developer - Data Atelier Advertising Agency
experiences.description: I'm a web developer with experience in building websites, deploying smart contracts, creating Web3 applications, and enhancing analytics, primarily using React JS, Shopify, WordPress, and Google Tag Manager.
